line.originaltext: 2 cups all-purpose flour
2 cups sugar
1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon
1/4 teaspoon salt
1 cup water
1/2 cup vegetable oil
1/2 cup butter or margarine
1/4 cup baking cocoa
2 eggs
1/2 cup buttermilk
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 cup butter or margarine
1/3 cup whipping cream
1/4 cup baking cocoa
1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon
3 cups confectioners' sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 cup finely chopped walnuts
In a mixing bowl, combine the first four ingredients.
In a mixing bowl, combine the first four ingredients.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing15, ing3}, ing19, "first four ingredients", "")

line.originaltext: In a mixing bowl, combine the first four ingredients.
In a saucepan, combine water, oil, butter and cocoa; bring to a boil over medium heat.
In a saucepan, combine water, oil, butter and cocoa; bring to a boil over medium heat.
line.annotation: combine({ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7}, ing20, "saucepan things", "")

line.originaltext: In a saucepan, combine water, oil, butter and cocoa; bring to a boil over medium heat.
In a saucepan, combine water, oil, butter and cocoa; bring to a boil over medium heat.
line.annotation: cook(ing20, t1, ing21, "boiling saucepan things", "bring to a boil over medium heat")

line.originaltext: pour over dry ingredients; mix well.
line.annotation: combine({ing19, ing21}, ing22, "things to be mixed", "pour saucepan's contents over dry ingredients")

line.originaltext: pour over dry ingredients; mix well.
Add eggs, buttermilk, vanilla and baking soda; mix well.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing23, ing8, ing9}, ing24, "batter", "")

line.originaltext: Add eggs, buttermilk, vanilla and baking soda; mix well.
Pour into a greased and floured 15-in.
Pour into a greased and floured 15-in.
Pour into a greased and floured 15-in.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
line.annotation: cook(ing25, t3, ing26, "baked batter", "bake at 375 degrees for 15-20 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake at 375 degrees F for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing26,"toothpick inserted near center of pan comes out clean")

line.originaltext: Meanwhile, for frosting, combine the butter, cream, cocoa and cinnamon in a saucepan.
Meanwhile, for frosting, combine the butter, cream, cocoa and cinnamon in a saucepan.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing13, ing14, ing2}, ing27, "things in saucepan", "")

line.originaltext: Meanwhile, for frosting, combine the butter, cream, cocoa and cinnamon in a saucepan.
Cook and stir over medium heat until butter is melted and mixture is heated through.
line.annotation: cook(ing27, t4, ing28, "cooked saucepan things", "cook and stir over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Cook and stir over medium heat until butter is melted and mixture is heated through.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing28,"butter is melted and mixture is heated through")

line.originaltext: Remove from the heat; beat in sugar and vanilla until smooth.
line.annotation: combine({ing16, ing17, ing28}, ing29, "things to be beaten", "")

line.originaltext: Remove from the heat; beat in sugar and vanilla until smooth.
line.annotation: mix(ing29, t4, ing30, "beaten things", "beat until smooth")

line.originaltext: Remove from the heat; beat in sugar and vanilla until smooth.
Stir in walnuts.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing30}, ing31, "frosting things", "stir in walnuts")

line.originaltext: Carefully spread over hot cake.
line.annotation: combine({ing26, ing31}, ing32, "frosted cake", "spread frosting over cake")

line.originaltext: Cool completely.
Cool completely.
